data.title: THE ORIGINAL SIN by Quinn, Anthony: Very Good Soft cover (1972) 1st Edition, Signed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: Signed by Author(s) - 1st Edition - Soft cover - Boston: Little, Brown - 1972 - Condition: Very Good - 8vo. Black wraps. A pamphlet of about 32 pages which the publisher describes thusly: "This brochure contains uncorrected advance proof of the introduction and two chapters from" the book. The covers show rubbing and dusting and the pages have tanned a little with age. Signed on the title page by Quinn. - THE ORIGINAL SIN
data.text:
About this Item

8vo. Black wraps. A pamphlet of about 32 pages which the publisher describes thusly: "This brochure contains uncorrected advance proof of the introduction and two chapters from" the book. The covers show rubbing and dusting and the pages have tanned a little with age. Signed on the title page by Quinn. Seller Inventory # ABE-3117512136
